channel.title: Documentation – Aspose.Cells for Reporting Services Report Designer
channel.description: Recent content in Aspose.Cells for Reporting Services Report Designer on Documentation

item.title: Reportingservices: Support Shared datasets
item.description:
Aspose.Cells for Reporting Services : Support Shared datasets

Aspose.Cells for Reporting Services supports SSRS 2008R2 shared datasets. When the Aspose.Cells Report Designer opens a report definition file which includes shared datasets, it can automatically get dataset information which includes fields form report server.

item.title: Reportingservices: Import Report Definition File for SSRS2008 or SSRS2008R2
item.description:
Aspose.Cells for Reporting Services : Import Report Definition File for SSRS2008 or SSRS2008R2

When Aspose.Cells for Reporting Services Report Designer opens a report definition file, it can import report items into a Microsoft Excel file.

item.title: Reportingservices: Configuring Report Servers to store or cache the report server data
item.description:
Aspose.Cells for Reporting Services : Configuring Report Servers to store or cache the report server data

The Aspose.Cells for Reporting Services Report Designer saves the current accessed report server URL. When you open the Report Server Manager dialog in the Aspose.Cells Report Designer again, the dialog form automatically loads the saved report server information.

item.title: Reportingservices: Support tablix group page break
item.description:
Aspose.Cells for Reporting Services : Support tablix group page break

It sets Group Page Break (Between) and Page Break for table report item. The default value is set to no page break.
